General.Name: Prince Pipes And Fittings Limited
General.Description: Prince Pipes and Fittings Limited manufactures and sells polymer pipes and fittings in India. It offers plumbing and industrial solutions, such as pipes, fittings and valves, industrial piping systems, plumbing system, and reclaim piping systems; soil, waste, and rain water (SWR) solutions, including roof water and low noise SWR systems; and underground drainage solutions comprising underground drainage piping systems, inspection chambers, and underground double wall corrugated pipes. The company also provides agriculture pressure pipes and fittings, and borewell systems; electrical conduit pipes and fittings, and cable ducting pipes; and water storage tanks, as well as surface drainage systems. Prince Pipes and Fittings Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
